name: SPNR
description:
The most spinning game of 2018!
Fill in the gap as best as you can! What does not fit in the gap gets cut away. 3 perfect fills in a row makes you grow.

Challenge your friends for the highest score!

Game Features:
- TAP only gameplay
- Free to play
- Addictive gameplay
- Simple & colorful design
- Endless gameplay
- Compete with others for the highest score
